channel.title: Cheezscape 80's plentuous Java.Lang.NullPointerException errors
channel.description: anyone got any idea how to fix these? [b]i got them in: object spawning trying to take a god cape from statue when u hav lower than the required stats and many more such as my prison command, spawning walls around a person[/b] here is my data: (ya i set port to 4000 so i could work while testing) Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:4000 config\objects.cfg: file not found. Summoning: Loading monsters from Summon.cfg ... Summoning: Loaded 25 monsters from Summon.cfg! ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.1.1:1360 Client type: high memory version UserId: 54067963 test is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [b]java.lang.NullPointerException at Theiving.TakeCape(Theiving.java:48) at client.objectClick(client.java:2385) at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16185) at client.packetProcess(client.java:14027) at client.process(client.java:13997) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137) at server.main(server.java:49)[/b] 4Everscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player test ClientHandler: Client test disconnected. ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.1.1:1362 Client type: high memory version UserId: 54067963 test is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 i checked it out, but idk what to add where it uses nulls. i think im sposed to add objects, but idk what... can someone please help? anyone? anyone at all?

item.title: Cheezscape 80's plentuous Java.Lang.NullPointerException errors
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

anyone got any idea how to fix these?
i got them in: object spawning
trying to take a god cape from statue when u hav lower than the required stats
and many more such as my prison command, spawning walls around a person
here is my data: (ya i set port to 4000 so i could work while testing)
Starting CheezScape Server on 0.0.0.0:4000
config\objects.cfg: file not found.
Summoning: Loading monsters from Summon.cfg …
Summoning: Loaded 25 monsters from Summon.cfg!
ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.1.1:1360
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 54067963
test is signing onto server.
LOADED: 3
java.lang.NullPointerException
at Theiving.TakeCape(Theiving.java:48)
at client.objectClick(client.java:2385)
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16185)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:14027)
at client.process(client.java:13997)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:49)
4Everscape Server [fatal] - exception
Game saved for player test
ClientHandler: Client test disconnected.
ClientHandler: Accepted from 192.168.1.1:1362
Client type: high memory version
UserId: 54067963
test is signing onto server.
LOADED: 3
i checked it out, but idk what to add where it uses nulls. i think im sposed to add objects,
but idk what…
can someone please help?
anyone?
anyone at all?

Read full topic
